title: Export resource operation stdout
description: Represents the actual state of a resource instance in DSC. DSC expects every JSON Line emitted to stdout for the **Export** operation to adhere to this schema.

anyOf.title: Typical resource expected output
anyOf.description: Defines the expected output for a resource whose `kind` isn't `exporter` as the actual state of every existing instance of that resource on the system.

anyOf.title: Exporter resource expected output
anyOf.description: Defines the expected output for an `exporter` resource as a resource instance definition to recursively invoke the **Export** operation for.

https://raw.githubusercontent.com/PowerS.title: DSC resource instance
https://raw.githubusercontent.com/PowerS.description: Defines an instance of a DSC resource in a configuration.

dependsOn.title: Instance depends on
dependsOn.description: Defines a list of DSC resource instances that DSC must successfully process before processing this instance. Each value for this property must be the `resourceID()` lookup for another instance in the configuration. Multiple instances can depend on the same instance, but every dependency for an instance must be unique in that instance's `dependsOn` property.

properties.title: Managed instance properties
properties.description: Defines the properties of the DSC resource this instance manages. This property's value must be an object. DSC validates the property's value against the DSC resource's schema.

https://raw.githubusercontent.com/PowerS.title: DSC resource fully qualified type name
https://raw.githubusercontent.com/PowerS.description:
The namespaced name of the DSC resource, using the syntax:

<owner>[.<group>][.<area>][.<subarea>]/<name>

For example:

- Microsoft/OSInfo
- Microsoft.SqlServer/Database
- Microsoft.SqlServer.Database/User

https://raw.githubusercontent.com/PowerS.title: Instance name
https://raw.githubusercontent.com/PowerS.description: The short, human-readable name for a DSC resource instance. Must be unique within a DSC Configuration document. Must be a non-empty string containing only letters, numbers, and spaces.
